name: Rodney Moody
text: Really good. Great place to teach a beginner and/or work on your game on a rainy day especially.

name: Rob Malone
text: Great fun, good beer prices.

name: Conner Jung
text: Great service and at a good price but the sensor was only picking up every other swing for some reason. Could have been just me though.

name: John Hollingsworth
text: Had a great time.  It's not the real thing but when you can't be on the course this is a great place to play.

name: Douglas Mitchell
text: Awesome place to take coworkers!

name: Hornaday quickfire
text: Awesome! I have never golfed but son wanted to try. Let me be clear....reserve your booth early! We called at noon to reserve at 4. The golf experience was great! Staff was terrific! Explained everything. We had fun. Ordered pizza and root beer. Pizza was overpriced, overcooked, frozen pizza. But this isn't a restaurant. Pizza was a snack, same quality at bowling alley or arcade. At the end of the day, yes I will go back.

name: Derek smith
text: Nice staff. Just as advertised. Bring your own clubs ever if you aren't any good. They have some but can't accommodate everyone for all clubs and lengths.

name: Jordan Giada
text: Cool place, cool people, plus you can smash golf balls and watch sports!

name: Ben Duckworth
text: Fantastic time, fantastic staff, and Cold beer how can you go wrong

name: Spencer Callahan
text: I have a blast every time I'm at Fairways. They have a great craft beer selection and the golf simulators provide great feedback for working on your swing, or you can just go and have a good time while enjoying the awesome graphics and wide range of courses. What's better than drinking a good beer and hitting golf balls? Not much... and now you can do it when it's dark or when it's raining outside!

name: Alabama Lucey
text: Only place I know of in Mobile to play inside golf.  They have a bar to get drinks but didn't offer real food, just some snacks.  They had four simulators.  We went on a Thursday and didn't have to wait.  My only real complaint was we paid for an hour, the machine froze up a couple of times and they kept the clock running while we waited for the attendant and while she was fixing it. A little steep on price but if it's raining or very hot it gives you another option.

name: Haley S
text: I love the atmosphere at Fairways and their monthly wine tastings are so much fun! Great drink selections and friendly bartenders. And you can golf any time no matter what the weather is like!

name: Alan Chastain
text: This is the perfect place to go to work on your swing especially here in Mobile since it rains so much. The golf simulators helped me work on my swing and I couldn't believe how many different national golf courses you could play on!

name: Zachary C
text: Great place, fun people, Golden Tee golf for the win!

name: Katherine Lovvorn
text: I love going to hangout and grab a drink! It's so fun to play golf indoors and not deal with the heat!

name: Dylan Stovall
text: Cool new place to hit some balls and have a few drinks. Good atmosphere and friendly staff.

name: James Duke
text: Great activity to get out of the summer heat. Reasonable pricing when you bring a group. Full bar available to keep you refreshed.

name: Russell Boren
text: Great customer service and atmosphere, the simulators just are not that accurate

name: Timothy Clark
text: Lots of fun and the price wasn't bad! Golf with air conditioning! Need I say more??

name: Dylan Sweatt
text: Nothing else like it on the gulf coast. Great place to go with friends

name: Rhen Bartlett
text: Fairways is awesome! Play golf in the AC and they have the best beers on tap!

name: Leigh Wright
text: Always a good time! Matt is a great bartender

name: kbarre06
text: This is the coolest idea! They have a full service bar and golf simulators with tons of different courses!

name: Joni Ward
text: Great service. Lots of fun.

name: NIkki Seabrook
text: First time I had ever been here and had a great time!

name: David Wright
text: Good place to play but would rather play top golf

name: William Fleming
text: Always a fun time!

name: Patrick Summerlin
text: It's something to do on a rainy day.

name: Mohammed ALKhateeb
text: Quite place

name: Johnny Collins
text: Machines r not that good. Over priced

name: Michael McCarthy
text: Fun experience

name: Michael Cummings
text: Great staff, a true hidden gem!

name: Synia Smith
text: Drinks and golf. What a plus that its inside

name: Anna Collins
text: It's very expensive and not well maintsined

name: Christopher Hefner
text: 50 people in line only 2 checkouts  open took about 45min to get threw the line

name: The Family
text: Great place

name: Cindy Strait
text: Love this store just for walking around
